main event: Multiple witnesses reported sighting three unidentified flying objects in Toledo, Ohio on 9 April 1949.
interesting points: The objects were described as round, saucer-like, and silver in color., Sightings were reported to a local newspaper, the Toledo Blade, which published an article about them., One witness observed the objects traveling at a slow speed and stated they were not airplanes., A total of six witnesses were mentioned in the newspaper article., Efforts to locate the original witness were unsuccessful.
witness description: Witnesses included individuals reported by the Toledo Blade and others in the community.
